!output bin
shru4_64 111111111111111111111111111111b
shru4_64 11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111b
shru4_64 101010101b
!output signed
shru4_64 8
shru4_64 200200
shru4_64 -1
shru4_64 0x00000000ffffffff
shru4_64 0xffffffffffffffff
shru4_64 1
!output hex
shru4_64 0xe1e1e1e1e1e1e1e1
shru4_64 0x1e1e1e1e1e1e1e1e
shru4_64 0xf0f0f0f0f0f0f0f0
!quit
